reviews.title: Rocket with no pocket!
reviews.review_text: I have two so far, the fit is great. I like the material and also it's hard to find Hawaiian shirts that don't have pockets. I don't like pockets. These don't have pockets so when I get ready to go to Mars, I'm gonna find me a rocket put on my shirt without a pocket.

reviews.title: Great Shirt.
reviews.review_text: The picture is true in color and we ordered Large. True in size and fabric is beautiful...washed very well also. He loved the cut and fit. Ordered this shirt to take on vacation; so it was in a suitcase for awhile but after unpacking it still looked great...and it was worn in 100 plus weather (St. Augustine, FL in July) but he looked great and comfortable too...

reviews.title: Inexpensive but good
reviews.review_text: The colors are vivid and survived its first wash unscathed. The fit seems dead on, and the shirt is comfortable while the fabric is quite thin; good for Summer wear. Not totally sure about the durability of the shirt long-term, but it seems competently made with no stray threads to start with. They include a spare button in case something happens. Wish they made "Tall" sizes, but XXXL worked okay for me at 6'2" and 265lbs.
The color is awesome and it fits great. Must wear darker color pants/shorts. The lighter colors of pants/shorts tend to make the shirt overwhelm the outfit.

reviews.title: Happy, Happy with this shirt...
reviews.review_text: This shirt is BEAUTIFUL. The colors are so vibrant and pleasing to the eye. Fits great and true to size. Great fabric quality...Husband was very happy with this purchase. Mens favorite color...shades of BLUE! Laundries well...

reviews.title: It wasn't a cotton shirt
reviews.review_text: The online descriptions said the shirt was 100% cotton but I don't think it is. It doesn't have a label that lists the shirt's material. It seems and feels like polyester and a neighbor I asked said she thinks it's polyester too. So what I thought I was buying from the website doesn't match the shirt that was shipped.

ive been size 2x for a long time. i have a closet full of button-up shirts, made by more than a dozen different manufacturers, they all fit very well, but the one I ordered here was way too small. it was tight across the shoulders and I could only button the top 3 buttons. im going to return it and order a 3x. I'll try to let you know how that goes.

reviews.title: Not Cotton as described
reviews.review_text: Not as described. When you click through the description of these shirts, it will tell you that they are 100% cotton they are not! They are Shein in quality (plastic material) and smell terrible right from the bag. So very disappointing to be mislead by the description of these shirts.

reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.review_text: It is plainly and prominently advertised as cotton. In fact, the following was cut and pasted from the website: "Alimens %26 Gentle Cotton Short Sleeve Hawaiian Shirts for Men Floral Summer Holiday Shirt" However, there is no cotton in the shirt. It is Rayon and Spandex. Unless you open the specifications, you would not know that this cotton shirt is not cotton. Unfortunately, I did not open the specifications before ordering.

reviews.title: If paper was cloth, it would be this shirt.
reviews.review_text: The description is just a flat up lie. It's not cotton at all. It's a stiff, scratchy blend that is paper thin. The color does not match the picture on the listing, which shows it as a bright vivid neon pink. What I got was nowhere near as bright or as colorful. And the sizing runs really small. I wanted an extra large shirt that fit loosely. What I got was something that does fit but is form fitting and almost tight. Given the qualities of the shirt I received, I am suspicious that all of the glowing reviews for them are fake.

reviews.title: Lack specific information
reviews.review_text: 1. The fabric was synthetic not cotton. But since the cotton shirts shrunk tremendously, this was a good thing. Their light weight is functional in Florida, heat and humidity. 2. The Asian 3X size is snug compared to the Puritans that you sold five years ago.. 3. The labeling on the shirt was cryptic at best. The website doesn't always give the fabric description. The website may describe it differently. The two partial cotton shirts had no cleaning; they both shrunk beyond salvation.

reviews.title: Cotton?
reviews.review_text: It was advertised as 100% cotton. I'm not sure its 100% cotton, as it did not shrink or wrinkle after washing, however it does have enclosed (flat fell) seams on the inside, and everything was sewn well, my husband likes it, and the Walmart days deal was great. I purchased 3 others in different colors at the same time.

reviews.title: Pretty colors
reviews.review_text: I purchased this shirt for my sweetheart . He loves it %26 I love it on him. So far it's been worth the money. It holds out really good no ironing is needed. If you take it out of the dryer and hang it up before it gets cold my kind of deal. Thank you.

reviews.title: Not correct description of what it is made of.
reviews.review_text: It is advertise to being 100% cotton and on the item it does not state what it's made of, but it's obvious it's not 100% cotton! Also, there is no listing where it had been manufactured. I kept one shirt but returned two because I am sensitive to synthetics I'm going to give it away as a gift. They are very attractive shirts.

The shirt seems decently made but does not feel like cotton at all despite it says 100% cotton in the description. There is no tag that says what it is made of. Disappointed because I bought it thinking it was 100% cotton. I would have settled for 50 or 60% so I'm probably sending it back.

reviews.title: No tag on shirt saying Cotton
reviews.review_text: I bought this shirt because it said it's 100% cotton. But after looking at the shirt, there is nothing label on the shirt that says it's cotton. I believe it to be Rayon. Not cotton... Most likely a complete rip-off. I won't know for sure until I wash it and see if it's cotton or not!!

reviews.title: Cotton or synthetic?
reviews.review_text: Website says the material is 100% cotton. It doesn't feel like 100% cotton. It has a synthetic feel to it and the odd thing is there is not a tag inside the shirt that tells you what the material is made of. I'm not sure I've ever bought a shirt that didn't tell you what it was made of. But it is definitely a nice shirt

reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising
reviews.review_text: I was searching specifically for 100% cotton shirts for my husband. When I found this shirt on the website I was really looking forward to its arrival. I was very, very disappointed to discover this shirt IS NOT cotton. I feel very betrayed by the seller for having misrepresented what they are selling. It's apparent it is not cotton and in order to further mislead the customer the seller did not go to the common courtesy of having a label on the shirt listing the fabric content. I would NOT recommend this shirt to anyone.

I i love the shirt. But it's one thing that's odd about it on Walmart's website. It says that the shirt is 100% cotton. It doesn't feel like cotton. It feels like a cotton synthetic blend of some type. Maybe it's hard to tell it's not scratchy, but it's not soft like cotton either and the odd thing is there's no tag inside the shirt that says what the material it is that is made. But I love the fits. Great looks great.
Love the shirt. it had great quality. a soft feel made very well. my boyfriend loved it. it looked great on him

reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.review_text: The short runs small but other than that it's nice. I would recommend this shirt but order a size bigger. Oh and it could use a chest pocket

reviews.title: cool and comfortable
reviews.review_text: this is a cool shirt to wear on hot days and drys really fast if u get it wet . i get compliments almost everytime i wear it.
this is a cheap polyester shirt absolutely not cotton and not worth your money. the seller is lying about the shirt being made of cotton.
I've now 4 of these shirts. I like them because they are lightweight and can get me by on the hottest of days.
Hawaiian shirts they fit great. They look great. Everybody comments on them makes everybody happy. I love wearing them.

reviews.title: Not cotton
reviews.review_text: The color is great and the fit is too. It doesn't appear to be made of cotton. It feels and shines like polyester.

reviews.title: Hawaiian shirt
reviews.review_text: Fun Hawaiian print to wear everybody comments how nice it looks goodbye I would buy it again Hawaiian shirt

reviews.title: NOT COTTON
reviews.review_text: This shirt is NOT 100% cotton as the description says. It's polyester. Made it near impossible to use them as intended also they were SO HOT.
The shirts are well made and come out of the dryer with no wrinkles.Very happy with the quality of these shirts. Win
wonderful shirts. excellent quality. nice sateen sheen feel to the shirt fabric. colors are true. launder easily.

reviews.title: R great value Hawaiian shirts
reviews.review_text: Really nice Hawaiian shirts, very comfortable have bought many of these, can't beat it for the price, would recommend

reviews.title: Vibrant colors!
reviews.review_text: The picture does not do it justice. It's colors are vibrant and the combination colors in this shirt are so beautiful! My husband absolutely loved this shirt and has worn it on many occasions. Don't hesitate to buy this one!!!!

reviews.title: Sunset Hawaiian shirt
reviews.review_text: Liked it when I bought it and I only wear it one time and then I put it in the laundry and I got misplaced and I do not have it anymore. I still want it though.

reviews.title: Nice comfy shirt
reviews.review_text: I love this shirt. Description says it's all cotton, but I don't think so it feels more like bamboo to me. It doesn't seem to wrinkle up while wearing it. Most of all I like the soft silky feel against my skin. I will be buying more.
this is not cotton its 100% polyester. The opposite from breathable. this is a hot shirt that doent breathe and it makes you sweat the mimute you try it on. not worrh your time or money.
My husband likes the material really likes the pattern. It fits well, but there's no pocket that's where he keeps his phone without a pocket that brings down the score.
Good quality, Hawaiian shirt really good dark color can be used at night as well as during the day I like wearing Hawaiian shirts they cheer everybody up I would buy it again

The shirt is very colorful and fits well. But it is NOT COTTON as the description said. Lengthy care instuctions ended by saying Dry Clean. No cotton at all in the shirt. I don't take every day clothes to the cleaners.
The material was different than I expected. I had expected rayon but it is polyester. However the fabric is very silky and the colors are vibrant and it wrinkles far less than rayon.

reviews.title: Hawaiian shirts exclamation
reviews.review_text: Good quality shirt, bright colors, very comfortable have bought several of these shirts, and very fast shipping very happy customer would recommend
Great quality for the price. Washed really good, without shrinkage and wrinkling. The fit was true to size. Loved the color and would buy again.

reviews.title: Unexpectedly long
reviews.review_text: I just wasn't expecting it to be so long. Thought it'd be the type of shirt you wear untucked but, It's so long that it looks a little silly to have it untucked

reviews.title: Great shirt
reviews.review_text: I was a bit leery as description said all cotton. I'm not sure what the fabric is but it is cool and comfortable to wear. Also, it doesn't seem to wrinkle and several different patterns to choose from. Great buy, I love them.

Bf loves it!! Super comfortable and fits him perfectly, it's a little loose but that's his preference. Great gift!! Got a large and most T-shirts he could size up to an XL in almost. I'm glad that I didn't chose to size up!

reviews.title: Nice and Bright
reviews.review_text: It looked nice and bright, and it runs a little big but not by too much. The quality is good for the price but again it looks great. The event my boyfriend with this on was perfect and he's fixing to wear again on cruise. Light weight and airy.
The shirt does not list country of origin nor the fabric content. This violates FTC rules. I have contacted the FTC and CBP as to these violations. The shirt us not cotton as listed.
This is a Men's shirt but back in the 1990's my Husband had a blue Hawaiian Shirt I always wore. Today I bought an Orange one just for myself. ❤️🎶💋
My husband's favorite color is orange so he loved it! I was impressed with the quality and both of us by the fabric! Lightweight soft n silky breathable and easy care.

reviews.title: Synthetic shirt
reviews.review_text: False advertising. It's not cotton This is a synthetic fiber shirt. I should read the comments before buying it. I think Walmart should not allow these sellers, they will loose loyal customers because of these people.

reviews.title: Not Cotton
reviews.review_text: only ordered because stated as Cotton, it's nylon, rayon, or polyester, doesn't have a descriptive label other than Designed in Italy, and wash in cold, dry very low heat, best dry clean, the color and pattern I ordered is nice, the package fold lines did not come out in the wash (cold) , no pockets, will work best over a tee shirt

reviews.title: great shirt literally my favorite thing to wear
reviews.review_text: this is an excellent shirt. it's very lightweight and breathable, it has a silky touch. I get compliments on the shirt all the time. I love the colors. it doesn't fade out or shrink from multiple washes. I've had it for a couple months and haven't had any issues with fabric quality at all. no rips, or tears

reviews.title: nice summer shirt.

Trying to take extra care of it I ruined it. I promised him I would replace it as soon as I found one like it. It took almost 40yr. Thanks

Garment tag does not give any indication to what the material is or where it was made.

reviews.title: Fellow Cruisers Will LOVE this shirt!

Not only are the colors bright and brilliant but the purple dominant color will be VERY CRUISEY indeed! A great price as well! Great buy, great colors!

reviews.title: 84th Wedding Anniversary gift
reviews.review_text: So cute. So silky and soft. This shirt is so good looking. I bought this for my Father to wear at their 84th wedding anniversary on July 29. They are the longest married couple in the state of Arkansas. This years colors are purple and white, with the theme "Only God"!!!!

reviews.title: Definitely worth the price. Order one size larger
reviews.review_text: Nice light fabric. Rich colors. Being a big guy it has the same issues as all other big man's shirts. They fit great until you get down to the bottom two buttons. The manufacturers need to recognize this and make the bottom half a little bit looser fitting. If I order the larger size it falls off my shoulders.

reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
reviews.review_text: This is very flimsy material; THIS IS NOT COTTON!! The material does not have a label, is advertised as 100% cotton, however it is most probably a nylon, polyester blend. I was under the impression the advertising was accurate and I was purchasing cotton shirts. I purchased 5 of these shirts at the same time and NONE of the shirts I purchased is cotton!! NONE!!

reviews.title: Not sure it is 100% cotton
reviews.review_text: The description says 100 % cotton but it feels more like a synthetic shirt. It washed nice and looks good. If it rayon I won't be able to wear it when it hot and sunny. I will see how it turns out. There is no label inside the shirt that tells when materials in it.

reviews.title: Fun Shirts
reviews.review_text: My husband absolutely loves his Hawaiian style shirts not all stores carry them so when I found out that Walmart has them in at the great price that they sell for it's just amazing they're comfortable. He says they come in gray colors. Great styles and they're just awesome. Thank you.

reviews.title: Not as described!
reviews.review_text: The description said their shirts were 100% cotton, and while the shirts I received did not have a tag stating the materials used, it was easy to tell that it was not a natural fabric. My cousin, who I bought these for, is allergic to polyester, rayon, and other man-made materials. It was very deceptive. Be warned!

reviews.title: Really Really SMALL!
reviews.review_text: The shirt is lovely, the fabric is really soft and it would be an excellent shirt if the sizing were correct. I don't know how they size their shirts but it sure isn't like other companies. I wanted a big loose comfortable shirt mostly to wear around the house and in casual settings. I ordered a 5X to make sure it was big and roomy. I normally wear a 3X but I couldn't even pull this shirt closed enough to button it. Their 5X is obviously more like a 2X I don't understand how this is even possible? I've gotten shirts that were a size off but to be 3 sizes off? It's ridiculous!

Somehow had the impression that this shirt was made of cotton or at least part cotton. It clearly is not cotton, nor does it disclose its actual content, anywhere on either labels. The best we can guess is rayon from the feel, and that will require different handling than expected. Plus the packaging was very dusty, inside and out.

reviews.title: While worth the price….
reviews.review_text: The material seems to be a polyester though the ad says that it is 100% cotton. As a Hawaiian shirt it should be fairly loose, I ordered mine 2 sizes too large to fit properly. I'd suggest at least one if you want a proper “Hawaiian shirt” fit. The shirt itself does not contain the label that states what the material is made from as well as any care instructions. Regardless of these issues I like the shirt I ordered and for the price it's a descent shirt. I mean really this style shirt in 100% Cotten would be more along the lines of $70

reviews.title: Nice Shirt but really really SMALL!
reviews.review_text: The fabric is really soft and the shirt is beautiful. The colors are bright but it is not American sized. I normally wear a 3x but I wanted a big loose comfy shirt so I ordered a 5X and I can't even close it. The 5X is more like a 2X. It took about a month for it to be delivered. They didn't ship it for more than a week and turns out it came from Hawaii so shipping took a long long time. I wouldn't have minded waiting if it ran true to size but it must have an Asian size because it's really small.

reviews.title: The shirts need to be advertised differently!
reviews.review_text: First of all the shirts are not 100% cotton! Then the sizes are completely off,I ordered a 3X which would fit me just fine.The sizes they make I would have to have a 5X or larger to fit me. These shirts are definitely not what they advertise them as being. But on a good note, I like the way they look they just advertising them completely wrong!

reviews.title: NOT Cotton
reviews.review_text: NOT Cotton. The description very clearly says that this is 100 % cotton, but it is a thin polyester-type material. None of the tags say what the material is. I am so disappointed. This was going to be a Christmas gift but now I will have to return it.

reviews.title: Made of rayon, not cotton!
reviews.review_text: This shirt was described as being made of 100% cotton, but it appeared to be made of rayon (although it had no fiber content label). The care label said to machine wash the shirt in cold water but to dry clean it for best results. These instructions are consistent with how to care for rayon. If you want a cool cotton shirt, do not order this! I returned it.

reviews.title: Not 100% Cotton as advertised
reviews.review_text: The shirt is nice and well-taylored, with nice buttons, but it is definitely NOT made out of cotton. It feels like polyester, which is cheaper to manufacture and does not allow your body to stay cool in hot temperatures. Polyester suffocates your skin and you can easily overheat in polyester. More and more, Walmart's apparel lies and says it's 100% cotton when it is not or it is only part cotton and part something else. These shirts left the description of what they are made of because they know they are deceiving the customers. Will be returning and I would not recommend this product.

reviews.title: Not 100% Cotton
reviews.review_text: NOT 100% Cotton it is a polyblend but couldn't find a tag to confirm, you can tell by the feel of the fabric. The material is soft and comfortable but not 100% cotton. The patter is beautiful and size runs on smaller side but I ordered one size larger just in case. Still pleased and will keep.

reviews.title: Sizes run small; fabric not cotton
reviews.review_text: Fast shipping. Beautiful designs. Shirts seem to run a little small. Returning the two I ordered and ordered more in the next larger size. The material doesn't feel like cotton. And there's no tag stating what the material is. It's on the slippery side - like a rayon blend. Overalll, my husband was happy with the purchase. You just never know about sizes %26 fit.

reviews.title: Great if you need novelty costume
reviews.review_text: Mediocre quality. For larger size it tends to run a bit snug (but ordered up a size). Label says luxury %26 made in Italy. Does not include fabric content anywhere on shirt labels. Hahaha- looks like maybe a low budget souvenir shop novelty item. %26 don't expect a pocket.

reviews.title: nice shirt
reviews.review_text: i was upset that the ad said this shirt is cotton, it's absolutely not. it's a cool shirt which surprised me being that this shirt is clearly plastic (nylon, polyester are plastic) it's livable though and i wore this shirt all day at cedar point amusement Park in the third week of July and i was pretty cool all day and i received lots of looks!

reviews.title: Not Cotton, but nice fit.
reviews.review_text: These shirts, I bought three, are not cotton as they are advertised. They are polyester. Very sticky on the skin and not comfortable in hot weather. I bought a larger size but still uncomfortable in hot weather. Tags only read, “Designed in Italy.” No other information.

reviews.title: Not cotton. otherwise, good value.
reviews.review_text: I thought this was cotton. Maybe because it was advertised in Amazon as cotton, Uncomfortable polyester. But, as usual, this particular brand seems well made for a low price. Were it not for the cotton thing, I'd recommend it for the price. seems stitched well and has few nice tailoring features for cheap money, like the extra button inside, etc. Very large lapels, though.

reviews.title: Great shirt
reviews.review_text: These shirts did not shrink, bleed or wrinkle. Material very soft, doesn't seem 100 percent cotton but seems to breathe nicely. I was expecting to have to iron them but they wash and dry exceptionally well. Buttons are well sewn. Great value for the price. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.title: Not what I was expectingi
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a bright shirt that hubby and I could wear, but I wanted 100%cotton which was all over your description. The 2 shirts I rec'd were NOT COTTON at all. I presume they are poly...no where on the shirt could I find the kind of material it is...only that it was made in Italy. Hubby loves his so I'll keep it but don't advertise something that is wrong.

reviews.title: 100% lie about being 100% cotton
reviews.review_text: Because I only like the feel of natural fabrics on my skin, I will pay the extra to get 100% cotton. This is 100% polyester. Taking it out of the bag you could hear the static electricity. Hint for those who don't know, 100% cotton doesn't get static electricity. Feels awful. Doesn't breathe. No wonder it was so cheap. Sending this crap back immediately.

reviews.title: Lies
reviews.review_text: Description said 100% cotton they are not they are 100% polyester, there is no tag on the inside to tell you the materials it's made of or where it is made besides one tag that said designed in Italy, this maybe but it was not manufactured there most likely China as is everything else. Terrible do not recommend

reviews.title: Looks good. Great for poolside or beach wear.
reviews.review_text: Shirt looks great and fits just right. This style of shirt is supposed to be a little big, so it can hang loose. A medium is just right for someone who can wear a medium T-shirt. Surprisingly, I am still really warm with it on, so maybe it does not breathe as much as I expected, but I still love the shirt. It is good quality. Wrinkles a bit and could use some ironing.

reviews.title: Great shirt!
reviews.review_text: I bought matching shirts for my son and his uncle. I was a bit hesitant based on reviews of sizing and material. The shirts do run a size or two small, but just take that into account when ordering. The material was great…not cheap or flimsy. It is cool and comfortable and washes up nicely without wrinkling. Great buy!

reviews.title: Love this shirt
reviews.review_text: Such beautiful colors, comfy, nice fit and style. I wore during vacation road trip from Las Vegas Nv to Austin Tx, changing out with other brands of similar shirts. This one got so many compliments everywhere I went. Only Con was that I could see where it might get stuffy if humidity got high, but springtime weather was perfect for it. Did I mention the colors? So nice.

reviews.title: What a disappointment
reviews.review_text: Not much to like here but plenty to dislike... The sizing is 2 sizes below what is shown. I ordered a 4xl and got a 2xl. Also, this shirt is very much NOT cotton, but some kind of polyester blend. The stitching was done by someone who had a real hard time with straight lines. Given the lack of quality, it is no surprise there is fiber content or country of origin tags on it. I wouldn't want to claim that either.

reviews.title: power chair
reviews.review_text: To short feet hang way off im 5 ft 7 to hard.

reviews.title: fast delivery
reviews.review_text: great shirt but it said to be dry cleaned, so I returned it.

reviews.title: Toes on the sand
reviews.review_text: Totally awesome dude! Immediately puts you that beach vibe.

reviews.title: not a cotton shirt
reviews.review_text: this is listed as 100% cotton. its acrylic and has no tags for fiber contents.

reviews.title: Great Shirt!
reviews.review_text: Bright Colors And It's Actually The Right Size!!!

reviews.title: No pockets
reviews.review_text: This shirt has no pockets in it. That is a big downfall as far as my husband is concerned.

reviews.title: Fathers Day gift
reviews.review_text: very nice print. Fathers day gift was happliy surprised

reviews.title: looking for a nice comfortable summer shirt this i
reviews.review_text: excellent fit really comfortable, perfect shirt for the summer for casual wear.
Like the pattern, color, and most of all the price. Clearance.

reviews.title: Great and comfortable
reviews.review_text: like the fit, the carefree cleaning, i wash and hang to dry.
This is not cotton!!! I would not have bought this from the store.

reviews.title: Material not Cotton
reviews.review_text: There is no label stating the material. It advertises cotton but is not cotton.
it advertised made of cotton but it is polyester and i am allergic to polyester
great shirt but it said it had to be dry cleanned, so I returned it.

reviews.title: Fits well
reviews.review_text: the product is as expected in the xolor and size. fits will

reviews.title: great Summer shirts excellent fit
reviews.review_text: excellent fit love the way it feels on the skin.

reviews.title: Summer shirts
reviews.review_text: My husband loves these shirts ! They look so great on him!
easy to order on line %26 arrived before the projected date.

reviews.title: Two thumbs up 👍
reviews.review_text: Really nice shirt, vibrant colors, will order more!
Lookin forward to wearing this shirt when the weather gets better. Good quality, feels good!

reviews.title: Love This Shirt
reviews.review_text: Great looking shirt. Very comfortable. Shipped very quickly.
Delivery was sooner than I thought and the product exceeded my expectation

reviews.title: Missing this package
reviews.review_text: I'm so upset Walmart lost my package said deliverd my post office says it never arrived. Never have exsperinced this with Walmart yes I got refund but this was a birthday gift and now I had to reorder a differnt shirt

I bought a size 4 XL and when it arrived it was a 4XL but it barely fit my son who is a size Large, what are you guys thinking ?? If I buy a 4XL is because I need a super big shirt, I will never buy this brand again

reviews.title: Excellent Men's Shirts
reviews.review_text: Awesome shirt fits great my husband wares a 3 and 4 XLg. The material is beautiful and the colors are gorgeous. I highly recommend these. ive bought 4 of them so far. The only thing I can say is its to bad they don't have a breast pocket.

reviews.title: Would not order any other items.
reviews.review_text: This shirt falls way short of being an XL. My husband could hardly get it on. If I were Walmart, I would drop them until they do a better job with sizing.

reviews.title: I wear it every week at least once.
reviews.review_text: One of four perfect shirts. I am a fat old man, and women constantly tell me they love the shirt. HenanDe-YuanTrade might like to know, several women wish they could find a skirt or dress in this fabric and print.

reviews.title: Not as advertised!
reviews.review_text: I wanted a COTTON Hawaiian shirt and received a shirt of unknown fabric content, clearly not a thread of cotton in it. Very disappointed since it was for a Hawaiian theme party.

reviews.title: Not 100% cotton
reviews.review_text: Only reason I purchased this shirt because it was 100% cotton. After receiving the shirt it was not 100% cotton. Returning. Walmart needs to fix this false advertising.

reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
reviews.review_text: It's pretty true to size I wanted mine big so I usually get a 3x cuz I wear a 1/2x but thought if it runs small so I got the 4x I should of stuck to my 3x it's super big but I am happy for what I needed it for works out. I love the vibrant colors

reviews.title: party time
reviews.review_text: who doesn't love on Hawaiian shirt. I went up two sizes to get one to fit Loosely when I'm normal 4XL. I hand washed mine and hung it up to air dry still looks good for the money

reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
reviews.review_text: Bought this Shirt for my husband for our Hawaii Trip, he liked the short a lot I liked and he got compliments on it so definitely glad I picked this one for him . I will probably buy another one for him .

reviews.title: Not Cotton!
reviews.review_text: If you are looking to buy this for the print, go for it. If you are seduced (as I was) by the print and the label of 100% cotton, DO NOT BUY THIS. This shirt is 100% unbreathable, stactic nightmare, polyester or some other man made product.

reviews.title: 100% Cotton Hawaiian Shirt for Men Casual Wear
reviews.review_text: Excellent Fit and Wonderful Color Scheme to embolden a Man's spirit throughout the year. Great Price and prompt delivery to boot! Alimens and Gentle provided a great product with this Men's Hawaiian Shirt!!

reviews.title: Faulty advertising
reviews.review_text: Product description says the shirt is made of cotton. This is the only shirt I've ever bought that does not tell you its materials. It is definitely not cotton. Feels like polyester.

reviews.title: very soft and colorful shirt
reviews.review_text: my husband absolutely loves this shirt. it is very soft snd colorful. i gave washed it several times and it has held the colors and has not gotten smaller.

reviews.title: Material content wrong
reviews.review_text: I ordered this shirt because it said it was 100% cotton. There's no content label, but I don't think it has any cotton in it at all. I think it's rayon maybe? Definitely not the cool cotton shirt i was hoping for.

reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
reviews.review_text: This is a great shirt. Love the texture and the fit. You can't go wrong ordering this shirt. Colors are vibrant and it wears beautifully. Getting ready to order more.

reviews.title: Not Cotton!
reviews.review_text: Misleading information about products! Advertised clothing as 100% cotton when it's clearly not and NO fabric content label. WALMART, YOU FAILED US BY NO ENFORCEMENT OF QUALITY STANDARDS!

reviews.title: Wonderful colors!
reviews.review_text: Love the look, feel %26 everything about it; however, brand runs 1-2 sizes smaller than actual size. My husband wears a 4x %26 had to order 6x to hang loosely.

reviews.title: Great Hawaiian shirt for a great price!
reviews.review_text: Bought this shirt in 5 different colors for my husband for our upcoming cruise. Fits well and The material is a lot nicer than I thought it was going to be.

reviews.title: I wear each of them every week.
reviews.review_text: I've bought "Hawaiian" shirts from other locations. These four were the best. I am retired now, and after forty years of black and grey clergy shirts...Yahoo!

reviews.title: Nice shirt-Not delivered on time
reviews.review_text: Ordered a shirt for an event on Sunday, with a guaranteed no later than Saturday delivery date. Shirt arrived the following Monday. I give the shirt 5 stars-Guaranteed Delivery a 1.

just about everyone who saw me that said they like the shirt and wanted to know where I got it from so I told him and I've seen a couple of my friends in Hawaiian shirts but they're different from the ones I got

reviews.title: it made me look good
reviews.review_text: I wore my shirt to church and received so many compliments. the shirt is comfortable feels great I just love the colors the shirt is very well made worth every penny.
Bought these shirts for my husband and my Dad. They both love them and ordered more. They are soft, comfortable, and just as bright as the pictures show.

reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: I bought oversized and it was tight. Go at least 2 sizes bigger. Ad said 100% cotton, it didn't look or feel like any cotton I have seen. Cheap shirt was a fail for me.

reviews.title: good on Walmart; bad on shirt company.
reviews.review_text: 2xl size is tiny like a mens medium. returned to WALMART for full refund. good on WALMART. bad on shirt company. they should not sell to us cusstomers if they cannot get sizing right. thanks walmart.

Bought blue one last year for sisters boyfriend at Christmas. He loves it. Wears it all the time. Fit is exact. He is a big guy, 4x. Decided to get him the purple one this year. Sister might not talk to me for a while, but I know he'll like it.
Does not run that small as suggested in other reviews. I got a size Small for myself (female, 5'9", 128lbs) and it was long but not long enough to wear as a dress; I should have gotten a medium.

reviews.title: Nice but husband rejected fabric feel
reviews.review_text: It doesn't feel like cotton per my husband as he has bought these from Walmart before and they were a little thicker and I guess a different manufacturer. This might dry faster. I've told him that but he didn't like the texture of the fabric.

reviews.title: Alimens %26 Gentle Hawaiian shirt
reviews.review_text: Very soft and comfortable. Easy to care for and wash. My brother in law was delighted with the quality and colors. Thank you. Linda at Rebel Ranch Poms, Wisconsin Dells

reviews.title: Nice! Very Nice!!
reviews.review_text: This shirt fits great, very tru to suze. The fabric is soft, smooth %26 it is very well made. Love it so much I ordered another one in a different pattern!

reviews.title: Feels like polyester, not cotton!
reviews.review_text: There is no fabric composition labels in the shirt. Description online says it is 100% cotton but it definitely is not. Feels like polyester or some other man-made fabric!

reviews.title: Nice color, size was smaller then true fit
reviews.review_text: The color and comfort were very nice. Lots of compliments on colors. It didn't fit as a true fit size, it fit smaller. If I ordered again, id order one size up.

reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.review_text: I would have liked it, but it runs too small. If these shirts are 100% cotton they don't feel like it. No tags to state what type of material they are made of.

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: Bought this for the beach for my husband. For the price, you can't beat it! I'd say it runs true to size, but will not dry it in a dryer. It's the kind of material that will shrink.

reviews.title: Vacay on my mind!
reviews.review_text: This shirt is perfect for the person who always has that tropical vibe and can't seem to get Florida off of their mind! Beautiful print, lively, lots of compliments!

reviews.title: Very Comfortable
reviews.review_text: I bought this shirt for a theme party and I was very much surprised how comfortable it feels and how good it actually looks. I've owned it for a couple of weeks and so far so good. The best thing is the price, it was GREAT!

reviews.title: Hawaiian Style Men's Shirt
reviews.review_text: This bright colored Hawaiian Dress Men's Dinner Shirt isso lightweight and comfortable for these summer months. Nice shirt to wear for a casual dinner or a nice summer evening BBQ. Very soft, light and breezy material.

reviews.title: Runs small at 2XL, but love the look.
reviews.review_text: Slightly tighter than I expected, but cotton instead of silk might help with the cleaning bills. Vibrant orange muted by the black fits my style exactly.

reviews.title: Men's Hawaiian Shirt: purple 💜
reviews.review_text: Well constructed and stylish shirt. Light weight and perfect for spring and summer. Unless your in warmer weather climate than it's perfect year round.

reviews.title: Nice Man's Shirt
reviews.review_text: Very nice shirt. Well made with quality material. Runs small. My husband wears a 2X but had to have a 4X in this shirt. Good buy for the price! Highly recommend.

reviews.title: New favorite shirt!
reviews.review_text: Design is perfect. i can dress this up or down. Comfortable and light fabric. Very true to size IMO. I usually wear an XL so bought this in XL and has a nice semi loose fit that i like in my Hawaiian shirts

reviews.title: Nice shirt
reviews.review_text: My husband really likes this shirt. His only complaint was the buttons were too small, it's difficult for him to get the shirt buttoned. Washed up really nice.

reviews.title: Blue Hawaii Blah
reviews.review_text: Hawaiian print but just kinda blah. Didn't notice until gave gift that it did not have pocket. Really needs one. Basic. Also for larger sizes- prefer a little more generic cut/ fit. Wouldn't reorder.

reviews.title: Big and Tall—this is for you
reviews.review_text: My SIL is a big guy. Finding clothing for him, especially at reasonable prices, is extremely difficult. This shirt fit him nicely , price was great and shipping was fast!

reviews.title: Misinformed
reviews.review_text: Absolutely misinformed! Shirt is not 100% cotton it is polyester! I ordered in a very large size so I could use as a night shirt. I will be returning it.

reviews.title: I'm just too big for this but nice feel
reviews.review_text: just to small for me

reviews.title: Honest
reviews.review_text: For a 4X size shirt that is more like a 2X fit, It is very disappointing!!!

reviews.title: Colorful casual shirt!
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this well made shirt! I got it for a colorful neighbor, he loves it! Price was not too high as some others are!

reviews.title: Good Looking Men's Shirts.
reviews.review_text: I bought a few of these mens shirts in different designs. Husband loves them all the material is great and they wash and dry very well.

reviews.title: Hawaiian shirt
reviews.review_text: Shirt is so pretty and lightweight. Perfect for a cruise. Haven't washed it yet so can't comment on that aspect.

reviews.title: Light Bulb
reviews.review_text: I was under the assumption that my purchase was a lamp and the light bulb to go with it. Now I need to find a lamp. Not happy at all.

reviews.title: sweet
reviews.review_text: I like the shirts. require a little or no maintenance other than the normal washing hang them up and ready to go.

reviews.title: Not Cotton

the material is soft an silky feeling, husband loves it on these 3digit days says it is cool feeling

reviews.title: Would Recommend it
reviews.review_text: The shirt fit just right. The fabric is nice also. I would definitely recommend it. Great price, also!

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: The shirt is of good quality, very lightweight and comfortable. Didn't like paying extra for shipping.
Just as described. My husband loved it. He is a big guy and it is hard to find shirts that fit him. This one was true to size.

reviews.title: Spring, Summer perfection
reviews.review_text: Love this shirt. Brilliant colors and fits perfectly! For anytime but pool, boat and beach parties are perfect times for this beautiful shirt.

reviews.title: The shirt is a nice value.
reviews.review_text: Love the color and it was delivered in a timely manner. Comfortable fit. Great addition to my Hawaiian shirt collection.

reviews.title: I'll purchase it again.
reviews.review_text: Well I brought the shirt for my son and he loves it. It's made with a good fabric and he says it feels good as well

reviews.title: Red hawaiin button up short sleeve mens shirt
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my dads bday gift. Well made. Looks nice. Size large, fits as it should. Would buy again.

reviews.title: Fun shirt for a short time
reviews.review_text: There is no structure to the collar and button holes. I feel it will not be long before the button holes do not do their job.

reviews.title: Perfect Hawaiian shirt!
reviews.review_text: Great Hawaiian shirt! Light weight, perfect size, beautiful, bright colors. Seems to be good quality, didn't fall apart in the wash!

reviews.title: Tight fit
reviews.review_text: 2xl would normally be big on me. Unfortunately, this shirt doesn't even fit my neck, and the arms are tight as well.

reviews.title: Sizing runs small, please fix and I'd buy again.

I really like the shirt n so does my husband. He tried on and fits. He hasn't worn so idk how it will hold up in laundry. Right now I give it 5 stars

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: I loved the colors and it fit like a glove. Very satisfied. Lots of compliments. Goes with many combinations of shorts. Trousers.

reviews.title: Overall happy with this purchase
reviews.review_text: Seems very nice, it's a gift for father's day, so not sure how it fits yet but material is soft and good quality shipped in time.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Not cotton as advertised. Bought my husband 3 of them for vacation and he can't wear them. Big disappointment!

reviews.title: Aloha
reviews.review_text: Great price and received several complements at the Luau. The add said 100% cotton but there was nothing on the labels?

reviews.title: Vacay Shirts
reviews.review_text: Ordered 3 of these shirts for our upcoming vacation. Very nice material. All 3 of my guys like the styles, colors, and fit

reviews.title: A gift not sent yet!
reviews.review_text: Purchased as a gift and have not yet given it, but I think it will be perfect. It's a great color and will be great for the tropics.

reviews.title: Love this shirt!
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my husband, and it fits perfect. It's beautiful colors and it looks great with his skin tone. I would buy again.

reviews.title: Nice Shirt, Great Value
reviews.review_text: I saw this in the store, didn't have my size. Hated to pay shipping, but still a good value at the delivered price.

reviews.title: Fantabulous Men's shirt!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my 16 year old nephew and he loves it! It's soft, it's well made, it's true to size! It's colors are rich. All good.

reviews.title: COLORFUL
reviews.review_text: I love the shirt. It's soft and flowy. It washes well, wears well and looks good. Price is reasonable. Good buy.

reviews.title: Soft feeling shirt!
reviews.review_text: This shirt is soft and comfortable. The fit works well with me and it's perfect for Hawaiian days at work!! Irons pretty easily!

reviews.title: love it
reviews.review_text: love this shirt! the colors are so crisp and vibrant and the material is so soft! 10 stars for sure!

reviews.title: Beautiful colors
reviews.review_text: Loved the color on my husband material was soft. He said it was light and comfortable. Order came earlier than expected! Bonus!

reviews.title: Nice shirt for summer!
reviews.review_text: The shirt has a beautiful bright pattern and fits well. The sleeves are a bit tight for my husband, but will work since it won't shrink.

reviews.title: Nice addition to my Hawaiian shirt collection.
reviews.review_text: Love the color and the fabric feels comfortable. It fits comfortably loose like a Hawaiian shirt should.

reviews.title: Perfect fit for a tall man
reviews.review_text: This is exactly how a tall men's shirt should fit. I have spent up to $150 dollars on tall shirts that don't fit this well.

reviews.title: Be Aware shirt material is not 100% cotton
reviews.review_text: Advertised as 100% cotton. Felt more like Polyester or Rayon. Shirt labels had no material on them. Definitely not cotton. Made in china

reviews.title: Great Quality %26 Color
reviews.review_text: Great quality and great price! I would say it's a little lest then true to size. If you want an oversized look I would size up!

reviews.title: Faux Hawaiian shirt in Pennsylvania
reviews.review_text: The shirt was for my son . He stated that the shirt was comfy and he washed the shirt a few times . No fading of the colors .

reviews.title: Great shirt
reviews.review_text: I got this as a summer shirt for my husband and he loves it. Runs true to what your shirt size is. It's light weight.

reviews.title: Deceptive! Do not buy!
reviews.review_text: Shirts are advertised as 100% cotton and they are not. No tag with fabric content or country of origin. Feel like polyester. Returning.

reviews.title: Great Shirt
reviews.review_text: My husband loves the shirt and gets compliments on it everywhere he wears it. It launders like a dream and comes out of the dryer wrinkle fee.

reviews.title: Not Your Typical Hawaiian Shirt
reviews.review_text: The design is an abstract. Unique. The fabric is light, and great for summer. Try wearing it under a cotton or linen blazer. Recommended.

reviews.title: Perfect Gift
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it! Fits great %26 it is comfortable. The colors are very vivid! Great quality!
shirt tail is really long kimda wierd on a 5'10" guy. be good for tucking in or tall guys id imagine. other than that very nice soft and cool

reviews.title: Shirt review
reviews.review_text: The shirts are very comfortable and looks great. Only problem at least for me is that there is no pockets.
Needed a men's 6x shirt for event found this shirt it fit prefect and was shipped and arrived the next day.

reviews.title: Nice shirt
reviews.review_text: I have several of these in other colors. I get lots of complements. Very comfy. Easy wash/wear. What else can you ask for in a $16 shirt?

reviews.title: Nice generous fit but not cotton.
reviews.review_text: 100% yucky polyester. Fabric doesn't breath and miserable to wear in hot weather. Advertised as 100% cotton.
most comfortable short i have ever worn. also have had many coments how nice the shirt was price is unbeatable

reviews.title: Happy Father's Day
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my husband for Father's Day. He loves it!! The color is fantastic! Very pleased with this shirt!

reviews.title: A total Bait and Switch!!
reviews.review_text: The description said it was cotton. Instead I got some rag that said it needs to be dry cleaned and no fabric content is listed.

reviews.title: Great cruise shirt in fun print!
reviews.review_text: The shipping was fast! The shirt is a bright tropical print that will be perfect for our cruise! Fits true to size.

reviews.title: NEVER REC'D
reviews.review_text: Walmart never delivered to Queen's Medical center in Honolulu where I was for surgery temp address!!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Cool hawaiian shirt
reviews.review_text: I like the color and the material. The size is a little smaller than usual and there is no pocket which I miss.
WRONG SIZE SHIPPED............. HOW DIFFICULT CAN IT BE.????
boyfriend loved it and other people loved it on him

reviews.title: Order at least one maybe two sizes bigger.
reviews.review_text: Had to buy a 5x to get 3x size.

reviews.title: unhappy
reviews.review_text: this is not a 100% cotton shirt which is what I needed

reviews.title: Loves the comfort
reviews.review_text: Fits my son perfectly. He's almost 6 foot 200 pounds.
Nice quality for the price, fabric washes well no wrinkles
true to size. feels amazing and the color are still good.

reviews.title: Nice colors, runs small, ok material
reviews.review_text: Nice colors, runs small, ok material

reviews.title: shirt
reviews.review_text: Bought for hubby's b-day and he loves it. Perfect fit and he loves the way it feels and looks.
He loves the light weight material. He also really likes the way they fit.
